good.tweet: We must continue to work together to ensure national security. United we stand!
Make we all join hands to make Nigeria safe for everybody. We fit do am!
I dey always pray for Nigeria security forces. God bless them as they protect us.
Nigeria is my home, and I believe we can make it safe again. Let's keep hope alive!

bad.tweet: Dis country don tire me abeg. Wahala too much for Naija. 😒
No hope again for this country. Things dey go from bad to worse. 😔
This government no care about us at all. Na so so suffering everywhere.
The level of insecurity in this country is alarming. We need action now!
I just want to see a better Nigeria for my children. E no too much to ask.
We dey hear big big talk about security, but for ground, nothing dey happen.
